testcase.classname: Users are able to send their multiplication
testcase.name: The user sends a first right attempt and gets a badge
testcase.system-out: When the user john_snow sends 1 right attempts..............................passed Then the user gets a response indicating the attempt is right...............passed And the user gets 10 points for the attempt.................................passed And the user gets the FIRST_WON badge.......................................passed

testcase.classname: Users are able to send their multiplication
testcase.name: The user sends a second right attempt and gets points only
testcase.system-out: Given the user john_snow sends 1 right attempts.............................passed And the user gets the FIRST_WON badge.......................................passed When the user john_snow sends 1 right attempts..............................passed Then the user gets a response indicating the attempt is right...............passed And the user gets 10 points for the attempt.................................passed And the user does not get any badge.........................................passed

testcase.classname: Users are able to send their multiplication
testcase.name: The user sends a right attempt after 9 right attempts and then gets a badge BRONZE_MULTIPLICATOR
testcase.system-out: Given the user john_snow sends 9 right attempts.............................passed When the user john_snow sends 1 right attempts..............................passed Then the user gets a response indicating the attempt is right...............passed And the user gets 10 points for the attempt.................................passed And the user gets the BRONZE_MULTIPLICATOR badge............................passed

testcase.name: The user sends a right attempt after 49 right attempts and then gets a badge SILVER_MULTIPLICATOR
testcase.system-out: Given the user john_snow sends 49 right attempts............................passed When the user john_snow sends 1 right attempts..............................passed Then the user gets a response indicating the attempt is right...............passed And the user gets 10 points for the attempt.................................passed And the user gets the SILVER_MULTIPLICATOR badge............................passed

testcase.name: The user sends a right attempt after 99 right attempts and then gets a badge GOLD_MULTIPLICATOR
testcase.system-out: Given the user john_snow sends 99 right attempts............................passed When the user john_snow sends 1 right attempts..............................passed Then the user gets a response indicating the attempt is right...............passed And the user gets 10 points for the attempt.................................passed And the user gets the GOLD_MULTIPLICATOR badge..............................passed
